channel.title: Free Runescape Membership/ Money 100 % Legit - No downloads/Virus/Questions
channel.description:
Hey Guys! Today I would like to share with you guys the way i made 5 dollars in about 20 minutes to get my membership!
I know my post count is shit. All my posts are in the help section tho as i try to help everyone out. Mod or players can verify this it works 100%!
Today I am going to tell you how to make some money using just your iPod, iPad, or iPhone. "How?" you might ask. Well, in this guide, I will show you how. Let's start at step one.
STEP 1: REQUIREMENTS: You must have a iPod Touch, iPad, or iPhone from apple to do this You must have a Paypal account to do this.
STEP 2: Go onto your iDevice, into safari, and type in m.appredeem.com
STEP 3: Now you have to create a quick account. This next part is very important, so read very carefully!!!
you must use the same e-mail as your Paypal account to sign up for AppRedeem so that they can send the money you earn as a "gift" to your Paypal account.
STEP 4: Follow the on-screen instructions to make the icon on your home-page for AppRedeem.
STEP 5: On the app, there is an option to type in a bonus code. Type in volcanicsea and you will recieve 25 free points! (25 cents)
STEP 6: Go into the AppRedeem app and download your first app. It should redirect you to the Official Apple Store.
STEP 7: Open up the app you just downloaded and just fiddle around with it for 30 seconds to a minute.
STEP 8: Exit out and go back into the AppRedeem app. The page should reload and in the top left-hand corner it should say you earned something between 15 cents and 30 cents.
STEP 9: Keep downloading all the free apps they offer to earn a little bit of money.
INFORMATION: -If you run out of apps to buy/download for free on AppRedeem, wait till the next day(s) come, and there should be more apps to download. -If you get the paid apps, you'll get more money out of it than the free apps that you can download. -On your computer, search AppRedeem on Google to visit there official Computer site and see how this all works.
What can you use this money for???
Well, once you've racked up a good amount of money around 5-10 dollars, you could use that to a membership on Runescape! Or you could use it to buy what ever else you want to buy.
I hope you enjoyed my quick guide to make money on the fly, and I hope you use it well! I already have around $5 in 20 minutes on my PayPal account, and truthfully from this method!
Ill add pictures when i get time!
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2h2pqgo.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@poprocker75 wrote:

Hey Guys! Today I would like to share with you guys the way i made 5 dollars in about 20 minutes to get my membership!

I know my post count is shit. All my posts are in the help section tho as i try to help everyone out. Mod or players can verify this it works 100%!

Today I am going to tell you how to make some money using just your iPod, iPad, or iPhone. “How?” you might ask. Well, in this guide, I will show you how. Let’s start at step one.

STEP 1:
REQUIREMENTS:
You must have a iPod Touch, iPad, or iPhone from apple to do this
You must have a Paypal account to do this.

STEP 2:
Go onto your iDevice, into safari, and type in m.appredeem.com

STEP 3:
Now you have to create a quick account. This next part is very important, so read very carefully!!!

you must use the same e-mail as your Paypal account to sign up for AppRedeem so that they can send the money you earn as a “gift” to your Paypal account.

STEP 4:
Follow the on-screen instructions to make the icon on your home-page for AppRedeem.

STEP 5: On the app, there is an option to type in a bonus code. Type in volcanicsea and you will recieve 25 free points! (25 cents)

STEP 6:
Go into the AppRedeem app and download your first app. It should redirect you to the Official Apple Store.

STEP 7:
Open up the app you just downloaded and just fiddle around with it for 30 seconds to a minute.

STEP 8:
Exit out and go back into the AppRedeem app. The page should reload and in the top left-hand corner it should say you earned something between 15 cents and 30 cents.

STEP 9:
Keep downloading all the free apps they offer to earn a little bit of money.

INFORMATION:
-If you run out of apps to buy/download for free on AppRedeem, wait till the next day(s) come, and there should be more apps to download.
-If you get the paid apps, you’ll get more money out of it than the free apps that you can download.
-On your computer, search AppRedeem on Google to visit there official Computer site and see how this all works.

What can you use this money for???

Well, once you’ve racked up a good amount of money around 5-10 dollars, you could use that to a membership on Runescape! Or you could use it to buy what ever else you want to buy.
